meta.content: The Southern Berkshire Regional School District, SBRSD, is a small, close-knit community of inspired faculty, staff, and students. We proudly represent the Southern Berkshire towns of Alford, Egremont, New Marlborough, Monterey, and Sheffield.

div.strong: The Southern Berkshire Regional School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, age, creed, national origin, disability, sex, religion, limited English proficiency, housing status, actual or potential marital status or parental status, sexual orientation, or gender identity.
